name: Intiwasi Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rodrigo was very helpful with planning before we even arrived - we had taken a bus from Mendoza and he had set up a pickup from the bus station (despite our not knowing which terminal we would arrive into!) Our room was fantastic - the largest we had in a 3 week stay in South America, and both Rodrigo and Victoria were fantastic in terms of conversation, tips on the city and day trips, transfers, restaurants, etc. We wished we had more time in their fantastic city and would stay here again in a heartbeat.
reviews.title: You won't get a Chile reception from this hotel!

reviews.text: We went down for my goddaughter's wedding in July and stayed for approximately 3 weeks. It was winter, which means there was no central heating and it was cool in the rooms but the bedding was sufficient to stay warm. The hostel was clean, homey, had kitchen for meal prep and wifi. The proprietors Rodrigio and Victoria were friendly, helpful, and responsive to our needs, questions, and requests. The facility was cleaned daily, linens exchanged regularly and they were constantly making improvements to the infrastructure. THe location of hte hostel is ideal just off Los Leones shopping district, block and half from the subway and an upscale older residencial neighborhood. Never had any qualms about going out at night, close to supermarket. Would I stay there again, "IN A HEART BEAT"
reviews.title: WOULD I STAY THERE AGAIN? IN A HEARTBEAT

reviews.text: I booked my stay for only two days but I finish staying one entire week. This place is really awesome and enjoyable, staff and owners are helpful and nice, they told me where to go and what to do in this vibrant city, it was the best Chile's welcome I could get!. The place is quiet with excellent vibe, the common area is equipped as well as the kitchen, the hostel was always tidy and clean. I stayed in a Single ensuite, big room, furnished, with Tv cable! the bed was large and comfy, best sleep ever, there was a big closet where I put my luggage safely. WiFi was fast and the breakfast was one of the best. I really liked the original native touch! Location is fantastic, so centric next to the Metro and all kind of shops, big stores and services, pretty and safe neighborhood.
reviews.title: One of the best places I've ever stayed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I also met nice people here, I definitively recommend it!

description: An old house from the forties transformed into a cozy and homey hotel, central location in Providencia one step away from the Metro system and a wide range of services. We offer a design Boutique Hotel inspired by native and natural elements, modern spaces and premises, equipped rooms with good standard to satisfy your rest and stay. Enjoy of an exquisite coffee in our terraces and garden or take a delight in the elaborated and special menu by the restaurant, where you will taste the best regional ingredients accompanied by an original presentation. We award you the most essential and dedicated services along with a personalized attention. We look forward to meet you!
